data_description.url: The URL of your Portainer instance. For example: https://127.0.0.1:9000
data_description.port: The port number of your Portainer instance
data_description.api_key: The API key for authenticating with Portainer
data_description.verify_ssl: Verify the SSL certificate of the Portainer instance

user.description: You can create an `access token` in the Portainer UI. Go to **My account > Access tokens** and click on **Add access token**
